block.p: * Flavio Correa, president of Ogilvy & Mather, Latin America, has given up his role as head of the Brazil sector to Ronald Assumpcao. Newton Guerra has been named new vice president of Ogilvy & Mather, Latin America. * Marjorie R. Porter has been named vice president and account director at D'Arcy Masius Benton & Bowles, New York. * Appointed as account management representatives at Ogilvy & Mather, New York were: Bill Gray, Neve Savage, Michael Vaughn, David Warden and Jack Reed. * Virginia Kraus has joined Wells, Rich, Greene, New York, as senior vice president and director of local broadcast. * Robert Cook has been named senior vice president of marketing for Columbia Pictures Television.
